messages.content: Successive governments have failed young people, renters, future generations, and all who rely on the NHS. We need a new politics and new politicians to make a better, fairer UK.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Too many live in unpleasant, insecure conditions. Greens will build 500,000 socially-rented homes and use landlord licensing to raise standards.
The UK long had the most effective and efficient health-system in the world. The Greens would end NHS privatisation. We will invest in the health of the country, with equal status for mental health.
The young have been penalised by tuition fees and poorly funded and over-examined schools. Greens will scrap tuition fees and bring back the Education Maintenance Grant.

The Greens will take immediate steps to reduce the lethal air pollution that has spread across Enfield. We will invest in public transport and better walking and cycling routes. To reduce the burden of climate change on our children, Greens support a clean economy and the phasing out of fossil-fuel energy generation.
The Tory Brexit would slash protection for workers and the environment and damage our economy. Only the Greens offer a ratification referendum with the option to remain in the EU.
